Name: Castle Kingdom Wars
About the game: Defend your castle and crush your opponent's castle. Unlock new heroes and improve them to defeat your enemies. Upgrade your castle and unlock more features. Make your own strategy to beat your enemies. Characters have different skills so you can defeat your enemy with different tactics. Knight, swordsman, archer, skeleton, mage, catapult and much more hero are ready to fight for you. There are 2 game modes in this game: 1- You can play singleplayer and play agains ai. there are lots of different levels in singleplayer mode. 2- There is also a battle simulator sandbox mode. Spawn warriors in the battle arena and see how they fight against each other at the battlefield. You can spawn any hero and watch hero wars. There is no character limit at this mode so you can play with lots of heroes at battle simulator.
